籤詩版本二:
ʻO ka hui ʻana o yin a me yang e hoʻoholo mau ʻia e ka lani.
Akā i ka ʻike ʻana i ka hui ʻana o ka deragona a me ka nahesa, ua komo ʻo Xiong Zhen i ka hui mele moe a hui hou ʻia.
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka hui pū ʻana o Yin a me Yang a me Dao.
Holo maikaʻi nā mea a pau.
解曰: E hahai i kou puʻuwai. ʻO ka male ʻana a me ka hāpai ʻana. Waiwai waiwai. ʻOi aku ka pōmaikaʻi i nā ʻano kilika māla.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hui pū ʻo Li Dan a me ka deragona a me ka phoenix
Ua lilo ʻo Li Dan i Ruizong no ka moʻokūʻauhau Tang, ua piʻi ʻo Wu Zetian i ka noho aliʻi, a ua hoʻohaʻahaʻa ʻia ka mōʻī i ka makaʻāinana a noho i ka ʻāina, ua hālāwai ʻo ia me Hu Fengjiao a male. Wahi a ka moʻolelo, ua lawe ʻia lāua ʻelua i ka hapalua o ke sila huinahalike i lawe ʻia mai loko mai o ke kāʻei fetal, a ma hope o ka hala ʻana i ka "sila hakakā", ua hōʻoia ʻia ua hiki ke lilo i hoʻokahi a lilo i kāne a wahine.
(E pili ana ka deragona iā Ruizong, a ʻo ka phoenix e pili ana iā Hu Fengjiao. ʻO ia hoʻi, ua hoʻoholo ʻia ka male e ka lani.)
聖意: Palekana hale, pono ponoi, waiwai, oihana, mare, Liujia, na kanaka hele wawae ma na kula, na enuhe silika, pomaikai na holoholona, ​​imi kanaka, hoaponoia na hoopii, pomaikai ka hele, loaa na mea nalowale, halawai mai na mai, maikai. loaʻa nā lāʻau lapaʻau, pōmaikaʻi nā mauna a me nā lua kupapaʻu
古人: Ua hui pū ʻo Li Dan, ka deragona a me ka phoenix
第X籤: E kau inoa ma ka lā iwakāluakūmākahi
